name: Hell Snails
description:
This game is a slimey local multiplayer wall climbing shooter arena.

Grab your pad and up to 3 friends and fight to be the first to summon the portal to heaven and escape snail hell.

This game was made in 5 days during the first Mango Jam. A local game jam we hosted to welcome two new members of the team and consolidate them as perfectly working pieces of our game-making machine.

This game is free. We may have some upgrading plans for it depending on the community response. All donations are very welcome.

We really hope you have as much fun playing as we had while crafting it.

Features

  • Different weapons for different approaches
  • Snail wall parkour
  • Trickshots
  • Fast paced gameplay
  • Strategy and skill combined
